values:
Based on our past experience, being on a different continent doesn't mean I'm further away.

Flickering yellow lights on a porch.

Traffic smog.

Small palms limit the lines on my hands, the lines on the maps and clocks.

I use my index finger and point out today's destination but still, no further.

Reading poems with camomile dripping from the tips of my fingers while Tim plays tambourine in the corner, whistling softly.

I don't know what truly is left, but it better be fucking good.

(hums)

How did she burn herself there?  It must be a birthmark.

Stay beautiful: Tim thinks I should attend.  It must wait.  January.

Hey 

This is funny to me. All these months later. Hm .. how things have changed. The wife is on a different continent and I'm still in Indiana. My, that's pitiful.

I am making chicken and potatoes for breakfast because I've been sick for two days. Today is day three. I also haven't had a cigarette for two days. .. coming up on three. Maybe I could quit? Is it possible?

Oh .. but you were so cute swaggering up that driveway, "are you looking for me?" that cigarette dangling precariously from your lips ...

You're addicted to..... Cocaine! I pity you, Cocaine isnt a good thing to be
addicted to. One of the more expensive drugs
out there and not to mention those damn
nosebleeds. Get help now!

What are you addicted to? (pics!)
brought to you by Quizilla HAHA!

girls make me blush.

I've decided to be trans for the day. it's an interesting thing. you see, because while I have long hair, I have no breasts and the body of a 12 year old boy -- so I could pass very easily.

this morning I hung out with Air Force Christina and so my knees are all weak and my palms are sweaty and I am more smiles than a circus clown.

Oh, life, how you are so fickle.

I've buried my blood in costumes of red these last few weeks -- hidden the piece of me that craves the desperate hours of an early morning when I've spent the whole night staring at the swirls in my ceiling and hiding from the questions/demands/influence of the outside world. I have closeted my ability to love, smothered my addiction to brutal honesty, served up my soul on a silver platter -- and what have I to show for it?

I have a predilection for emotionally vacant girls because I can already plan the outcome -- those with no brains have not the faculties to process me, relationships will end by my hand or theirs -- assuredly. This is my weakness -- in this way, I feel as if I control my own future, as if I might even be able to predict it. 

And so, onwards and upwards, let come for the next. 

I am too smart to be so easily persuaded. I love too quickly to do otherwise.

Sometimes I don't know what I'm doing besides sitting in my own stench, seconds closer to death.

and then I realize that my friend is lost amongst the ruins of current madrid.

and then I realize that she was planning on going to africa tomorrow, flying out today.



the world does not revolve around me.  it doesn't revolve around gandhi or hitler, jesus or britney spears.  It's a pretty hectic clash of all these things, and all I can do is move and keep moving towards whatever and whoever.

I'm pretty much a mover, I think, but I do stay long enough to take bits of people and giant chunks of memories.


I want to love something enough to make me stay.


But I'll just keep sitting, I guess, reading the news.  At least until I know she's okay.

it's been a while since I was here.

so strange. now, to look back, this was where i was honest last year, and things have changed so much. i have friendship. i have constancy. i have choice. and these are the fruits of a semester where I spun off from the regular world and tried to figure out who i was apart from it, not because of it. damn, it was crazy. angry. sad. desperate. but its over. and the fruits of that labor is a friendship i'm going to have for a while. and though she doesn't know it, she's crossing the bound of like and love faster than she thinks. 

trust, is still foreign to me. but friendship is mine. oh. fate. how you favor me.

"Robin Kasahara is a double major in Theatre and Whittier Scholars.  She is honored to work with such an incredible cast of vagina-lovers, and sends out a special "thank you" to her directors, family, roommates, Ionians and Lancers. Happy V-Day to cunt fans around the world! Support the Cause!"

she thanked me.  and it wasn't just any thank you, it's a SPECIAL thank you.

:)

except for you.

(but that's a given)

So after smoking a whole pack of cloves, cutting and drinking about 4 shots of cheap vodka, I felt better last night.

Too bad it didn't last until morning, when I woke up at 6 am to do fem philo work.

I'm sick of homework.  I want to go to bed and sleep sleep sleep.

I did get a call from my friend Helena this morning, her class got canceled (is that with one or two l's?), she offered to buy me something at starbucks.  she's nice.  I'm going to leona naess with her, it's gonna be good times.

I think I'm gonna take a shower.

yeah, that sounds like a good idea.

My lady -- 

Somehow you make sense to me even when the walls of my own houses betray me.

-Your Lady

Sometimes I think about how nice it would be to drive my car off of a cliff.

As for you, dear girl, who have taken away the safety I thought you of, instead, leaving me top fend for myself, to bear the worst of your gauntlet with you, and then ripping off my bandages in the meantime.

I have class with FAT GRACE! Remember fat grace? the one that had me all sick and skinny last semester?

My 'best' friend here, ALisha is leaving in a few days and that makes me sad.

The end.

this update is for you.

I'm tired.  I don't know what I'm doing.

And I want to call you to hear the rest of the story...sorry about the other night.

Hope your car is doing better.

I want to buy a scooter, but I think that food is more important at this point.

And Leona Naess concert tickets.

Hana asked me to call her by the name her family calls her.  Either I was fucking her name up really bad before, or that means she likes me (not 'get-into-her-pants like', like 'lets-be-good-friends like'), right?  One or the other.

And I have to tell you my humiliating story about the Palmers (a society--like a sorority).  Actually, I don't really care.  It's a little embarrassing, but whatev, yo.  I was with Robin yesterday, in rehearsal.  She told me that I was going to hell.  She also winked at me.

And I'm telling you, she was staring at me.  For me to notice this is a big thing, because I totally don't pick ANYTHING UP until way too late.

The problem is, it's not telling whether or not she was staring at me, it's WHY.  Maybe it's just to be rediculously sexual - because that's how she is.  I made this comparison to my friend courtney...

Hana:Robin::Mandy Moore:Angelina Jolie

in terms of image and such.

Hana's smart, but not crrazy genius smart.  She's got it together, though.  Very cute and such.  She's a dancer, and she's got a dancer's body...very nice.

Robin is sexual and smart and confident and you want to be friends with her if you can't have sex with her because you'd rather have her on your side than against you.

Last night, I talked to hana for a long time, she was taking apart my "type".  I get this a lot, since all the girls I like pretty much look exactly the same and have similar personality characteristics just tunneled differently.  Anyway, i htought it was ironic because she's TOTALLY MY TYPE and I don't know/don't think she gets it.

She keeps talking about how she'd be interested to see what it felt like to be in a relationship with a girl, but she's dating this boy and she's really into him.  We call him moron fucker face.  And by "we", i mean "I".  He's not nice to her!  He's a jerk.  Anyway, she's got it in her head that she needs to be in a serious relationship at this point, one that lines her up for marriage, so she won't dump him.

Robin is the kind of girl who CAN wink at someone and be really cool and smooth and such.  Gah.  Robin.

I'm gonna go drool all over my homework now.

lovelovelove.

This morning I awoke feeling nothing.

I don't want to see anyone.
And I don't know how it happened but everything I had planned out was wrong and I really don't give two shits or one half dozen of the other.

its a really strange thing.

I don't really love anything here. its sooooo weird.

the end.

Helena: don't go if i have a good reason not to
Helena: like ditching and going to the vegetarian restaurant w/ me
chinkyfriedrice: let's say I sprained my ankle?
Helena: which i want to take you to by the way
Helena: haha
chinkyfriedrice: I don't have any money!  and I can't let you keep paying for my stuff
Helena: that's lame
Helena: didn't u know? i'm a millionaire
chinkyfriedrice: I had the greatest idea the other night.
Helena: like joe millionaire 
Helena: but helena millionaire

dude.  I smell.  I need to take a shower.

If ours was a heterosexual relationship, I think I would be the boy because I'm so lazy I lay around dirty and eat stale popcorn for days.  And you're pretty.  It's true.

One time, Robin - remember, the confident girl? - was going to a party/stag with another society, and the police stopped her outside her house because they thought was was a hooker.

hah

so...what does it mean when you go out with someone and they pay for everything, inc concert ticket, dinner, drinks, dessert (at another place) and a mango hooka? and what does it mean when they give you all their cds, saying "giving them to you gives me reason to stalk you. But I've been doing that anyway" ??? I figured she was just being friendly. I dunno. I'm bad with this kind of stuff. And so anyway, she scares me because she's little and I was falling asleep and rambling about london or something and I think I might have told her way to much for her own good. also. she called herself my "sugar mommy" which made me laugh at the time, but now makes me scrunch up my eyebrows. I'm tired. this leads to me being too lazy to start my work. this then leads me to posting ridiculous entries on livejournal about how I'm tired and stressed out because I've got too much work to do. But really, I just kind of want to sit with someone and be quiet and have that be okay. I'm tired of doing everything for everyone else. I'm too involved on campus...right now, I'd rather just lay in bed with someone and listen to music or something. My favorite thing to do with kate was just to lay together. We'd talk about ridiculous things and it was nice. Every night, we'd lay in our beds, in separate houses and talk for hours about nothing. We'd read the ingredients in salsa to each other and the colors of dinosaurs, and that's when I fell in love with her. But that's weird, who am I going to lay with here? No one. Or how would I even go about getting someone to lay with me? I'm sad and lonely and I want to lay with someone. I don't want to have sex with them -- though that wouldn't be bad, either, depending on the person -- but I'd just want to lay. I think I am sad and tired because I am eating the oozy goodness that makes up cheesy fries at my school. mmmm. cheesy fries. but then I feel gross, and that makes me lazy. It's this vicious cycle, see? feel lonely => cheesy fries => feel sad => procrastinate => work hard => feel lonely. also. a lot of my friends are in the middle of pledging. Instead of greek life here, we have societies, and all of them are either initiating or being initiated...that's taking up a lot of their time. I'm hanging out a lot with my friend courtney, but she's depressed so we're just tired and miserable together. I have this issue with pride and independence, I don't want to feel like I need anybody. So when there are lots of people around, I keep them at a distance. But when they're scarce, I want to cry and shoot myself. It's been like this for the past couple years. I love our friendship. You are wonderful. I guess that's all i have to say. I'm gonna go caffeine it up and do some work.

maybe one of these days people will realize that i'm in the market for a good friend, not a good fuck.

someone is trying to tell me something. i went into january looking at forever with four different people, and now its all fucked up because of some stupid little thing called sex and somehow its made all the difference in the world.

its enough to make one want to pull the shades and stay in at night.
i wish i could think like other people so they would make more sense to me.
in the meantime, i love you katharine, kristin, kyla.

and linzi, somehow you've outdone the masses in the realm of friendship, a good laugh and a good time.
this, whatever this is, this nothingness with so many people, is not worth the breath i have to speak it.
i need to institute social cuts again, and i've got a hunch it will leave me with the two I started with: kyla and aaron, which means that i really should have just not even tried in the first place.

My teeth hurt for some reason and the girls on my floor laugh as they smash half-empty beer bottles against the recycling bin outside my door.  I wrote them up last night, accompanied by Meredith who wasn't comfortable with it, I'd rather be cautious and consistent than easy.  She came down last night, after the fight with my residents/her friends, who threw her an unhappy finger as she walked away.  We talked about sandwiches and quesadillas.

I called you at 10:46 AM this morning, CA time.  Tag, you're it, call me back when you're bored.  Hours or minutes, we could fill the time, and imminent happy heart attack on my behalf would be there without question.

What am I doing?  It's a question for my writing, as it's rough and as fluid as a stutter.  I think I'd rather know what you're doing though, I miss you.  Whatever you're it is, I'm jealous...

dude.

i'm totally bored.

and you should totally post to me/call me/email me or something cuz i'm like this totally rejected housewife and totally worked to pieces.

and apparently stupid and valley-girl-ish-for-the-moment

te espero.

Yesterday, class went really well because the girl with the lisp wasn't there - she ended up dropping it because she felt overwhelmed by it being "all upperclass" or what the fuck ever. She's just a wimp. My friend, Renee, and I organized a game that accurately showed issues dealing with race, class and gender. it was fun and took about an hour to process. before that, she had given us a reading to do, "it'll take about an hour". Renee and I went to sit on the couches across the hall...there we found Hana and we talked to her for an hour instead of reading. I don't know where the other hour went. Probaby debating, because there's this girl, vivian, who sucks and I don't like her so I'm going to attempt to FOIL HER every class period. I took a sleeping pill last night and it was bad news because it took me three hours to pull myself up out of bed. crazy. What happened to the old sheryl crow? or what happened to me, between the time I worshipped her and now? Yesterday I was told that this girl, Carolyn, wants to 'do' me, which is scary because she looks like a giant dinosaur bird that will swoop down at any moment and devour me. in the bad way. yay for going backpacking with amanda! that will be fun. speaking about lots of sex, I had a dream with my best friend from middle school/beginning years of high school, where we had sex and then she was sad because I was leaving for Whittier the next day. It was kind of dirty and weird.
And I'm looking through the glass where the light bends at the cracks and I'm screaming at the top of my lungs pretending that the echoes belong to someone someone I used to know and we become silhouettes when our bodies finally go

So my class sucks because there's 12 people there and only two of them know what the fuck they are talking about.  There's one person in particular I can't stand, this girl with a lisp and she's short and ugly.  We were in class for an hour and a half (half the time we're supposed to be there) and I wanted to shoot myself in the face because she talked non-stop about how her mother is a "raging feminitht".

fucking hell.

also.  Kate called me crying because she:

1) owes the library over a hundred dollars for overdue books and now they are sending her to collections
2) wants to take a roadtrip to CA with her friend that can't drive due to DUI charges and such...her parents are letting her take the hybrid, but want her to pay for her own gas
3) she dyed her hair and it sucks.

It's all her own fault...my responses were as follows:

1)  just turn the goddamn books in, stupid bitch.  Whore yourself to the bank manager ASAP and hopefully they won't send you to collections.
2)  They're letting you borrow their car.  I think it's pretty reasonable for them to ask for gas.  Can't you get Lindsey to help pay for gas?  ...She doesn't have a job?  Could you and your lush druggie friend drive her car?  Oh wait, she got her driver's license revoked and after that, her parents sold her car.  hm....that's true.
3)  don't dye your hair.  It's dry enough from all the puking you've been doing, you don't need to damage it anymore.

I'm in a bad mood and I feel gross.  I think I'm going to make myself some coffee and do my homework.

because that always makes me feel better.

Before I go, I am going to list three good things that happened today.  because that really does make me feel better.

1)  I saw rachel, the pretty freckled girl.  Found out she was model from Colorado and that she's "definitely bi-curious", whatever that's supposed to mean.
2)  

that's all I can think of.

fa sho.

I'm bored. and at work for 8 hours because I'm a poor bastard, literally.

I got my lsat scores back.

I am about to take a break from work :) I'm going to go smoke a cigarette and move my car (which you now know). I think my wife is hot when she smokes her cigarette and goes "are you trying to call me?"

it is really fucking weird to be back here.

i miss the hell out of amanda.
I adopted a cute lil' ninja fetus from Fetusmart! Hooray fetus! that could be our baby.

also.

I saw the most recent entry for this journal on my friends list and got excited because I thought it was from you.

Instead it's my own ridiculous rambling-ons about fatties and the psychological effects of the sociological conditioning of what physical beauty is on the average lesbian from the US, aged 18-24.

Does that last sentence make any sense?  I don't even care.  I'm tired.  must go............to...................bed....................................................
Going around online. Found website featuring PS models. Thought to self, "I wish those fat people would quit stealing jobs from anorexics." Wanted to share that brilliant moment in my life with you.

I changed the way this one looks, too. Now it has a fat old man who looks a little bit like sandy claws. Watched a movie with the fambly tonight, it sucked - but that was to be expected. I can't wait to see my wife again...but I do think that she should come out to visit in California - then I have my own room (it's true, it's a dorm room, but it's my own all the same) and where I can entertain her more efficiently. Then I can give her the box I've been meaning to send, as well.

my dad is the biggest prick there is.

which is better:

A) cash the check and not talk to him
B) send the check back and not talk to him
C) rip the check up and not talk to him
D) something else

fuck frodo and fuck lord of the rings man, 3.5 hours and my ass is as flat as the abs in the 'abs of steel videos' on a more philosophical note, is anything ever truly flat? surely there are bumps, even if on a microscopic level .. and thus cancel out the supposed flatness. anywho...finals are OVER and I got straight A's which is a just a big fuck you to public subsidized education and a happy happy happy that I have something good to show for these last few months of hell.  i'm gonna see my lady soon and very soon we are going to see each other :)

ps. i have the best best friend in the world :)

Finals are over. LSATs are over. I'm looking at the relationship of my life in the face and getting stared down. I'm looking forward to holiday vacation with my family. I'm thinking of her. I miss my wife, and I'll see her soon.

otherwise, life is good.
yesterday I had dinner with amanda.
I watched a movie with amanda.
I went to the bars with amanda.
I went back to amanda's house. 

now I'm not going to see her for 3 weeks :( 


then end.

so....about <lj user=angelleftwing> being <strike>uberhot</strike> really good looking -

she was on my friends list first.
Keira Knightley is really, really pretty.

I think my greatest fear in the whole world is that I'll never love anything again.

So that the anyone who realy loves me matters.

You are Janis Joplin...Janis (1943-1970) was one
bad ass chick. She is considered by many to be
the greatest white female blues artist of all
time. Janis didn't sugar coat anything. She
was hardcore. Janis died of an overdose.

So if you were a dead rockstar...who'd you be?

fierce and seductive, Selene vowed she would

"aggressive hunter of the underworld"
combines a mastery of ancient weaponry with
modern pleasures, such as driving Jaguars and

YOU come back!

YOU don't post to me anymore.
YOU are probably diddling the... (insert funny thing here)

I'm gonna see you soon.
:)
"I was welcomed at this court with the curiosity naturally inspired by any stranger who comes and breaks into the restricted circle of monotonous etiquette." --Benjamin Constant, Adolphe

i wish you people didn't take so much didn't ask me to hand over a pound of flesh and then maybe a sliver from each wrist wish that you might let me breathe for a second between lashings wish you'd let me hold to the side of the wall in between gauntlet runs what happened this fall i don't remember a darker season this november this october this september and it is no penance for summer was no gift and the year before and the year before and i'm slowly coming to terms with the absence of anything real anything worth wanting because the last three years haven't been worth the calendar paper they were written on because i never knew that people were so incapable of basic reason were no blind were no deaf were so far away and i don't remember when english became my second language and i began to speak in tongues but there are no ears to hold my voice and even those who would could never understand and i mean no drama i mean no sadness but the only safe walls are twelve hours away and the virus of my melancholia is eating away at him too.

"just let yourself go.  i can't promise you that you won't go to hell, but i promise i'll be next to you all night and through the morning."

so i've decided that last night i was flirted with by this girl helena
and the night before I made hana blush
to bad tonight i'm fucking augustine

its six in the morning and i'm soon to the library and i've got 75 mg of ephedrine running through my body because its finals week and i can't sleep because there is always so much to do and never enough time and never enough never enough but i've got six hours and a good set of tweak so i'll be set and tax accounting won't know what hit it i don't know if i'm ready for the semester to be over its been a free ride and a free fall but i haven't hit anything and really i could use the shake up could use the change of scenery even if it was the world blanketed in my own blood i could use a night where i didn't have to wake up and realize that i was an excuse for a trophy and a one night stand or a tick mark in someone's book of fucks it'd be nice if my ex girlfriend wasn't obtuse and didn't stalk me it'd be nice if I didn't have pneumonia it'd be nice if i didn't have exam damn the world isn't very nice or so it seems

why did you erase/take away all your other entries?

also.

you put interests on and we have nothing in common.  sad.

the right hand doesn't know what the left hand is doing

and i was thinking about you today and how I was finally going to see you and i smiled and then my toes were cold because I was wearing flip flops and it's a bit chilly here so I went inside still thinking about you and I was laughing and it was good because then I went online and figured out what a cigarette flamethrower was.

I love you.

so i fucking failed my fucking test in psych of personality which fucking sucks because i studied and I've gotten a total of four hours of sleep in the PAST THREE AND A HALF FUCKING DAYS

and i want to die

but i can't because i have two more finals of doom tomorrow and all I do is stare r shake because of the caffeine because I can't concentrate because this is SHIT FUCK GODDAMIT TO HELL MOTHERFUCKERS


what would a cigarette flamethrower be, exactly?

it helps to have a doctor father cuz then i've got a case of strep anytime i want, but now i've got pneumonia and i'm ugly as fucking sin and i've got finals and i got an email from tina last night and she wants to know what's up and i haven't written her since she took the tragedy of my november and turned it into one of her dramas but i write her cuz she had my word and i tell her that i'm good and that i'm fine but that there is too much to do and not enough time in the day but still i've got too much time to think and i'm tired of laying my hand down to a string of bluffs and this semester has been a nightmare and i want a cigarette flamethrower and my DPC and my sundays and my coffee and I want it over and over and over again until i forget there was ever anything else.

<font size=6><center>i'm not tired i'm not tired i'm not tired

it's surprising actually, how NOT TIRED i am</center></font>

<font size=1>all i want is to go to bed.  :(</font>

So last night, I was working feverishly on my medieval philosophy paper (and completing as many james bond levels as possible).  I knew i'd be tired as fuck - so what my plan to consume as much caffeine in a small time period worked like a charm.  A bit too well, when 4:00 am passed and I was up, I was awake when the energizer bunny died at 6:00, I was there for to see the sun stretch its rays around 7:00-ish, the faucets and sinks to start running around 10:00 am.  The truth is, as well, that I had taken a vicodin around 5:00 am and was then scared because the combination of too much caffeine mixed with depressants, I'm told induces a heart attack.  Anyway, sleep came around 11:00 am, one hour before my paper was due.  I woke up around 12:30 at the sound of one of Meredith's residents banging on my door to return a dvd player she had borrowed.  My paper was due at noon.

The end.
